product_name: Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The boys' Marmot Storm Shield jacket offers reinforced protection from wind and rain, keeping kids dry so they can enjoy winter flurries or blustery winds. PreCip(R) 2-layer nylon outer shell is wind- and waterproof while remaining breathable; polyester taffeta lining lies comfortably next to skin and provides light insulation. Seams are completely taped. Marmot Storm Shield jacket includes 2 zippered hand pockets for storing valuables. Full-length front zipper features double storm flaps for extra protection against the elements. Closeout.
short_description: The boys' Marmot Storm Shield jacket offers reinforced protection from wind and rain, keeping kids dry so they can enjoy winter flurries or blustery winds.
